name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: First requirement naman talaga is dapat lahat ng specs ng user ay pasok dun sa ibi-bid. Tapos out of all the bids that fit the specs, saka yung price, pero lowest talaga. This means, though, that the end user has to be very specific about the specs (including the quality) para pumasok yung gusto nilang bids na ok.
